document_data.title: Lost Refuge
document_data.author: [[Thiago de Oliveira Gonçalves]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Lost Refuge''''', designed by [[Thiago de Oliveira Gonçalves]], is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 4th-edition ruleset.

{{Quote|''An unseen menace lurks in the [[Cloak Wood]]. The common folk of the villages and logging camps along the perimeter of the forest have begun to vanish. The forest is filled with beasts, monsters, and vicious [[fey]]. And if that wasn't enough, the investigation just might end up involving you in an ancient, endless struggle. A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in [[Baldur's Gate]] for characters levels 7-10. This adventure begins the "Fey Gates of the Sea of Swords" major quest.''|}}
